column5: - Furniture in the bedroom was purchased in Oct 2016 - Bed sheets are washed before new guests arrive - Clean towels provided daily - Bathroom is frequently cleaned - DFW Airport is 26mi and Love Field Airport is 22mi away - Large table in separate room for dinning or working - High speed wifi internet - Jack and Jill bathroom - Free coffee (Keurig)  - Home is in safe neighborhood with security system
